description: The validation results for all software bill of materials (SBOM) attached to a specific software package version. Requires permission to access the ListSbomValidationResults action.

parameters.name: packageName
parameters.description: The name of the new software package.

parameters.name: versionName
parameters.description: The name of the new package version.

nested_items.name: validationResultSummaries
nested_items.description: A summary of the validation results for each software bill of materials attached to a software package version.

nested_items.name: fileName
nested_items.description: The name of the SBOM file.

nested_items.name: validationResult
nested_items.description: The end result of the SBOM validation.

nested_items.name: errorCode
nested_items.description: The errorCode representing the validation failure error if the SBOM validation failed.

nested_items.name: errorMessage
nested_items.description: The errorMessage representing the validation failure error if the SBOM validation failed.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
